examples.program:
Olive owns Blackacre.
Olive conveys Blackacre to Alice for life, then to Bob for life until Bob marries, then to Carol.
Alice dies.
Bob conveys Blackacre to Dave for life.
Bob marries.

O conveys Blackacre to A for life, then to B for life, but if C marries then to C.
A dies.
C marries.

O conveys Blackacre to A for life, then to B for life, then to C for life.
A dies.
B dies.
C dies.

O conveys Blackacre to A for life, then to B.
A conveys Blackacre to C for life, then to D.

O conveys Blackacre to A for life, but if B marries then to C.
A dies.
B marries
O conveys Blackacre to A for life until B marries.
O conveys Blackacre to A, but if B marries then to C.
O conveys Blackacre to A until B marries, then to C.
O conveys Blackacre to A until B marries.
O conveys Blackacre to A for life, then to B for life, then to C.
O conveys Blackacre to A for the life of X.

O conveys Blackacre to A for life, then to B.
A dies.

O conveys Blackacre to A for life.
A dies.
